quest.name: Gorgets Rising
journal: Serendipity has a new task for you.
Your next lesson requires that you craft three copper gorgets, for which you will need several copper ingots. Craft and deliver the gorgets to Serendipity.

Yet again your craftsmanship satisfies Serendipity, and yet again Gigi sees nothing worthy of praise. As a reward for your efforts, the guildmaster gives you a grinding wheel, which will aid you in your future goldsmithing endeavors.

※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 10.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh, Forename! I'm honestly a bit surprised to see you─most newcomers find Gigi's evaluations so harsh that we never hear from them again.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I'm so glad that you didn't take him seriously when he said your copper wasn't fit for a chamber pot. I mean, really, it doesn't even make sense─you could make a chamber pot out of anything!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Anyway, I hope you've been working hard, because your next task won't be nearly as easy as the last!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Listen well, Forename. I want you to make me three copper gorgets.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: For this, you'll need copper ingots, which you very conveniently learned to make last time.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Now, I directed you to purchase ore from Aistan before, but there are other ways to obtain it.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: You could dig it up yourself, or perhaps befriend a lonely miner and convince him to share some with you.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: However you choose to obtain your materials, I'm sure you'll put them to good use.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Are the gorgets ready yet, Forename? Don't keep me waiting too long!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Hmmm... Well, in my opinion─

dialogue.name: GIGI
dialogue.text:
NE※GIGIGI★※...
GoRgEtS...yOuR gOrGeTs ArE gOrGeOuS, gReEnHoRn. Oh WaIt, I mEaNt GrOtEsQuE. uNgOdLy. An AfFrOnT tO tHe GoDs ThEmSeLvEs. FoR sHaMe.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Beg your pardon, Forename. I'm afraid that constructive criticism isn't one of Gigi's strong points.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: But where was I? Ah, yes. Your gorgets are well made─strong and functional.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: And that's the least they should be, as they're meant to protect one's throat.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: When it comes to basic pieces like these, we don't have much creative freedom. Still, this doesn't mean we should put in less effort─especially since the techniques used to craft simple accessories are the same ones used to craft elaborate ones.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Now then, you've learned how to handle your hammer, but there's another tool I'd like you to get acquainted with.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: With this grinding wheel, you'll find it easier to add the finishing touches when you craft. Try using it, and you'll see what I mean.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Keep your nose to that grinding wheel, and you'll be ready for your next challenge in no time at all.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Certain gear grants bonuses to your craftsmanship, control, and CP values.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A higher craftsmanship rating hastens the progress of synthesis; greater control increases the chance of creating high-quality items; and additional CP improves your crafting stamina.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Outfitting yourself with an eye to your current objective will increase the efficiency of your crafting endeavors.
